org.robolectric.util

Class ActivityController<T extends android.app.Activity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.android.controller.ComponentController<ActivityController<T>,T>
      • org.robolectric.util.ActivityController<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivityController
    Deprecated. 
    Use ActivityController instead. This will be removed in a forthcoming release.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class ActivityController<T extends android.app.Activity>
extends ComponentController<ActivityController<T>,T>
